thread.section_title: Reservation Counter Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Reservation Counter | reservationcounter.com
thread.title: Lorraine Kinnie
thread.title_full: Reservation Counter reviewed by Lorraine Kinnie

author: Lorraine Kinnie
title: Lorraine Kinnie
text:
Boring
Rooms, old, dusty , mold
Food- greasy, tasteless, cold, overpriced
Slots- you will not win ! They only tease - never hit . Do not play
Table's - do not pay,
entertainment - none/no options/
Drinks - $4.50 - watered down
Staff - Friendly , Courteous , really nice, just doing their job
Even the elderly, senior citizens ( 98% of the visitors) were bored
Met Santa Claus - he was bored and laughed at the people coming to
lose their money.
Casino- small, musty, smoking allowed in the "non-smoking " area
Non-playing patrons sit around and count your money making annoying comments,
One local stated that they had a winner in the casino since last April
He comes only because they offer "free" rooms to TR members
This place is not what is expected from Harrah's
